function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases due to presence of other people living in the home.","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases within the household.","Mitigation":"Implement measures such as regular disinfection, social distancing, and hygiene practices within the home.","Technologies":"Smart home technology for contactless interactions and remote monitoring.","People":"People living in the same household.","Owner":"Homeowners or residents."},{"Description":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases due to presence of pets in the home.","Impact":"Risk of zoonotic disease transmission and spread of contagion within the household.","Mitigation":"Regular veterinary check-ups, hygiene practices for pet care, and limiting close contact with pets if unwell.","Technologies":"Pet care and monitoring devices for remote health tracking.","People":"Pet owners and household members.","Owner":"Pet owners and veterinary professionals."},{"Description":"Negative psychological effects on mental health due to the COVID-19 pandemic lockdown.","Impact":"Increased risk of anxiety, depression, and stress among individuals during and after the lockdown period.","Mitigation":"Access to mental health support services, mindfulness practices, and social support networks.","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms for virtual therapy sessions and mental health apps for self-management.","People":"Individuals affected by the lockdown.","Owner":"Healthcare providers and mental health professionals."}]}
